name: Woodland (Triangle)
description:
Entry  for the  Global Game Jam through the University of Gloucestershire.  Feed your mushroom plot to evolve and thrive. Spread your roots!

Instructions:

  • Add mushrooms to your woodland garden.
  • Upgrade your mushrooms using the energy they collect.
  • Max out your garden and spread your roots deep!

Made over 48 hours, solo. 

All art, music and code created from scratch for the game jam.
